title: Global sulfur production by country 2019
yAxis: Price in U.S. dollars per ton
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Price in U.S. dollars per ton in the y axis.
The Price in U.S. dollars per ton is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Brazil.
There is a difference of 16900.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Brazil.
